com.sysag_cds.people

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • com.sysag_cds.utility.TaskAgent
        • com.sysag_cds.people.Person
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Worker

    public class Person
extends TaskAgent
    Person Agent models the individual's behaviour who moves across the map for many purposes.
    Can become infectious and can infect other agents.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Person.SEIR
      The enum Seir which models the stages of the disease:
      SUSCEPTIBLE: the individual has never come in contact with the virus yet
      EXPOSED: the individual has come in contact with the virus and is now ill but not infectious yet
      INFECTIOUS: the individual can now infect other individuals
      RECOVERED: the individual is definitely healed and can't be infected again
      (package private) class  Person.TravelTask
      Task for reaching a destination across streets.
      (package private) class  Person.WaitingTask
      Task for waiting a specified amount of time.
      (package private) class  Person.WalkingTask
      Task for going for a walk.

        jade.core.Agent.Interrupted

      • contagion

        boolean contagion(boolean infectiousDPI)
        Probability that the contagion occurs beetwen two individual.
        Change this implementation to make the disease more or less contagious
        Parameters:
        infectiousDPI - the infectious' dpi value
        Returns:
        the boolean is true if the contagion occurs, false otherwise
